name: Medium Armor Bonuses
description: Each piece of Medium Armor does the following:  Reduces the cost of Sprint by 1%  Reduces the cost of Sneak by 5%  Reduces the cost of Block by 3%  Reduces damage taken from Area of Effect attacks by 2% for 2 seconds after you use Roll Dodge  Increases Movement Speed by 2% while immune to crowd control
rawDescription:
Each piece of Medium Armor does the following:

Reduces the cost of Sprint by <<1>>

Reduces the cost of Sneak by <<2>>

Reduces the cost of Block by <<3>>

Reduces damage taken from Area of Effect attacks by <<4>> for |cffffff2|r seconds after you use Roll Dodge

Increases Movement Speed by <<4>> while immune to crowd control
